Verses: 1 yosiyaavin Kumaaranum Yoodhaavin Raajaavumaagiya Yoyaakkeemudaiya Raajyabaaraththin Thuvakkaththile Karththaraal Undaana Vaarththai:

2 nee Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Praagaaraththile Nindrukondu, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Paniyavarugira Yoodhaavudaiya Pattanangalin Kudigal Anaivarodum Sollumpadi Naan Unakkuk Karpiththa Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum Avargalukku Sollu; Oru Vaarththaiyaiyum Kuraiththuppodaadhe Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

3 avargal Seygaigaludaiya Pollaappinimiththam Naan Avargalukku Seyya Ninaikkira Theengukku Naan Manasthaabappadaththakkadhaaga Oruvelai Avargal Kettu, Avaravar Thamtham Pollaadha Vazhiyaivittuth Thirumbuvaargal.
4 nee Avargalai Nokki: Naan Ungalidaththukku Erkanave Anuppikkondirundhum, Neengal Kelaamarpona En Oozhiyakkaararaagiya Theerkkadharisigalin Vaarththaigalai Neengalketkumpadikkum,
5 naan Ungal Munvaiththa En Nyaayappramaanaththinpadi Neengal Nadakkumpadikkum, Neengal En Sollaik Kelaamarponaal,
6 naan Indha Aalayaththai Seelovaappolaakki, Indha Nagaraththai Boomiyilulla Ellaa Jaadhigalukku Munbaagavum Saabamaakkippoduven Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
7 eremiyaa Indha Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Sollumpodhu, Aasaariyargalum, Theerkkadharisigalum, Sagala Janangalum Kettaargal.

8 sagala Janangalukkum Sollak Karththar Thanakkuk Karpiththavaigalaiyellaam Eremiyaa Solli Mudiththapodhu Aasaariyargalum Theerkkadharisigalum Sagala Janangalum Avanaip Pidiththu: Nee Saagave Saagavendum.

9 indha Aalayam Seelovaippolaagi, Indha Nagaram Kudiyillaamal Paazhaaippom Endru, Nee Karththarudaiya Naamaththile Theerkkadharisanam Solvaanen Endru Solli, Janangal Ellaarum Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Eremiyaavukku Virodhamaaik Koodinaargal.
10 yoodhaavin Prabukkal Indha Varththamaanangalaik Kettu, Raajaavin Veettilirundhu Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkup Poi, Karththarudaiya Pudhiya Vaasalil Utkaarndhaargal.

11 appozhudhu Aasaariyargalum Theerkkadharisigalum, Prabukkalaiyum Sagala Janangalaiyum Nokki: Indha Manushan Marana Aakkinaikkup Paaththiran; Ungal Sevigalaale Neengal Kettapadi, Indha Nagaraththukku Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Sonnaane Endraargal.

12 appozhudhu Eremiyaa Ellaap Prabukkalaiyum, Ellaa Janangalaiyum Nokki: Neengal Ketta Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum Indha Aalayaththukkum Indha Nagaraththukkum Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanamaai Sollak Karththar Ennai Anuppinaar.

13 ippozhudhum Neengal Ungal Vazhigalaiyum, Ungal Kiriyaigalaiyum Seerppaduththi, Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Saththaththaik Kelungal; Appozhudhu Karththar Ungalukku Virodhamaai Sonna Theengukku Manasthaabappaduvaar.
14 naanovenil, Idho, Ungal Kaiyil Irukkiren; Ungal Paarvaikku Nanmaiyum Nyaayamumaayirukkiradhai Enakku Seyyungal.

15 aagilum Neengal Ennaik Kondrupottaal, Neengal Kutramillaadha Raththappazhiyai Ungalmelum Indha Nagaraththinmelum Idhin Kudigalinmelum Sumaththikkolveergalendru Nichchamaai Ariyungal; Indha Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Ungal Sevigalile Sollak Karththar Meyyaagave Ennai Ungalidaththirku Anuppinaar Endru Sonnaan.

16 appozhudhu Prabukkalum Sagala Janangalum, Aasaariyargalaiyum Theerkkadharisigalaiyum Nokki: Indha Manushan Marana Aakkinaikkup Paaththiranalla; Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Naamaththile Nammudane Pesinaan Endraargal.
17 dhesaththile Moopparaanavargalil Silar Ezhumbi Sabaiyaagiya Janangalai Nokki:

18 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaavin Naatkalil Moresaa Ooraanaagiya Meegaa Theerkkadharisanancholli, Yoodhaavin Sagala Janangalaiyum Paarththu: Seeyon Vayalveliyaaga Uzhappattu, Erusalem Manmedugalaaippom; Indha Aalayaththin Parvadham Kaattilulla Medugalaaippom Endru Senaigalin Karththar Uraiththaar Endru Sonnaan.

19 avanai Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaavum Matra Yoodhargalum Serndhu Kondrupottaargalaa? Avan Karththarukku Bayandhu, Karththarin Mugaththai Nokkik Kenjinaanallavaa? Appozhudhu Karththar Avargalukku Virodhamaaga Solliyirundha Theengukku Manasthaabappattaar; Ippodhum, Naam Nammudaiya Aaththumaavukku Virodhamaaga Magaa Pollaappai Varappannugiravargalaayirukkirome.

20 keeriyaadhyaareem Ooraanaagiya Semaayaavin Kumaaran Uriyaa Ennum Oru Manushanum Karththarudaiya Naamaththile Theerkkadharisanam Sollugiravanaayirundhaan; Avan Eremiyaavin Vaarththaigalukku Sariyaaga Indha Nagaraththukkum Indha Dhesaththukkum Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Sonnaan.

21 yoyaakkeem Raajaavum Avanudaiya Sagala Paraakkiramasaaligalum Prabukkalum Avan Vaarththaigalaik Kettapodhu, Raajaa Avanaik Kondrupodumpadi Eththaniththaan; Adhai Uriyaa Kettu, Bayandhu, Odippoi, Egipthile Serndhaan.
22 appozhudhu Yoyaakkeem Raajaa Akporin Kumaaranaagiya Elnaaththaanaiyum Avanodekooda Vere Silaraiyum Egipthuvaraikkum Anuppinaan

23 ivargal Uriyaavai Egipthilirundhu Konduvandhu, Avanai Yoyaakkeem Raajaavinidaththil Vittaargal; Avan Pattayaththaale Avanaivetti, Avan Udalai Neesa Janangalin Predhakkuzhigalidaththile Erindhuvittaan Endraargal.
24 aanaalum Eremiyaavaik Kolla Janangalin Kaiyil Oppukkodaadhapadi, Saappaanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Akeekkaam Avanukku Sagaayamaayirundhaan.
